document.full_text: in this wealthy eastern chinese city known for its shrewd merchants, the owner of a factory that makes spectacles faces a difficult task: closing his money-losing business and dismissing his workers.
document.title: china factory town shudders at rising costs
lines_and_colors: in this wealthy eastern chinese city known for its shrewd merchants, the owner of a factory that makes spectacles faces a difficult task: closing his money-losing business and dismissing his workers.
